duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform daily inspection of products and test products being released for delivery, repairing, adjusting, or replacing defective components.
Calculate repair parts and labor costs for claims against vendors or delivery providers.
Order parts and maintain inventory of basic supply parts required for daily use.
Assess and disposition products returned to the Distribution Center daily.
Document quality issues as they occur daily and communicate to the Quality Manager at the respective plant.
Measure and report on the performance of product inspections and component replacements as required.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma/GED required, or equivalent with 0-2 years of experience
